name: @opyn/supabase
description: supabase module for opyn markets ui

scripts.supa:update: supabase db pull; bun run supa:gen
scripts.supa:gen: bun run types && bun run schemas
scripts.types: supabase gen types gen types --lang=typescript --project-id iyzpghlzpofnklzeeiws > src/supa.types.ts
scripts.schemas: bun run supa:remove && supabase-to-zod --input src/supa.modified.types.ts --output src/supa.schemas.ts

author: opyn.co
